sys_extension_point.description:
This Extension Point handles the decision for whether a particular type of Thing can be reserved.
Implementations must provide two methods:
a "canReserve" method that takes in four arguments (below) and returns a boolean: a GlideRecord for a Thing to be reserved a GlideDateTime representing the requested start date of the reservation a GlideDateTime representing the requested end date of the reservation a User object representing the User making the request
a "handles" method that takes in a single argument (below) and returns a boolean: a GlideRecord representing the Thing to be reserved
sys_extension_point.name: canReserve
